name: BiLangmuir
description: Bi-Langmuir isotherm with two types of binding sites

scalar_parameters.name: is_kinetic
scalar_parameters.description: Use kinetic binding (true) or rapid equilibrium (false)

component_parameters.name: adsorption_rate
component_parameters.description: Adsorption rate constant for site type 1

component_parameters.name: desorption_rate
component_parameters.description: Desorption rate constant for site type 1

component_parameters.name: capacity
component_parameters.description: Maximum binding capacity for site type 1

component_parameters.name: adsorption_rate2
component_parameters.description: Adsorption rate constant for site type 2

component_parameters.name: desorption_rate2
component_parameters.description: Desorption rate constant for site type 2

component_parameters.name: capacity2
component_parameters.description: Maximum binding capacity for site type 2
